name: Tetris0.2
description:
this is a Tetris game i made for you all so i hope you like it 

make sure to Bluetooth a key board if playing on iPad ohhhh and make sure to play in full screen. sound update coming soon.................. more things just click the screen once at the start then you will be able to control the blocks using the side arrow keys the down arrow will speed up the blocks the top arrow will rotate the blocks. 

                Hope you enjoy
